chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: To ensure that your environment meets the requirements of the cloud model you choose, see the check list in .

listitem.para: You can use a GUI that runs in your Web browser.
You can install via the command-line that exposes the full power and flexibility of &kw-hos-phrase;.

chapter.para: You should use the GUI if:

listitem.para: You are not planning to deploy availability zones or use L3 segmentation in your initial deployment.
You are satisfied with the tuned &vendor;-default &ostack; configuration.

chapter.para: Instructions for installing via the GUI are here.
Note that reconfiguring your cloud, at the moment, can only be done via the command-line. The GUI installer is for initial installation only.
